name: You cant Change Anything
description:
Every year thousands of young men kills himself by jumping off a bridge. We cant do anything about Death, but what we can do for them?

The topic maybe is "change what you see".

Maybe I want to show a serious topic, but without assets, many ideas cant be realized...even seem puerile.

Pixel Asset from Kenney Game Assets; the coolest Death is adopted from Grim-Reaper, I am sorry but it's really cool; and music from my favorite 炼狱庭园 and 魔王魂.
